summary: Implements the Bridgecrew integration layer for Checkov, handling authentication, configuration retrieval, error handling, severity and source categorization, and the preparation and upload of scan artifacts (results, metadata, graphs, assets) to Bridgecrew/Prisma Cloud services.
business_intent: Enable Checkov to automatically communicate security scan findings and related data to the Bridgecrew platform for centralized analysis, policy enforcement, and reporting.
